name: SortaPong
description:
Like the old classic tennis game Pong, but with some different features.

Features:

- Player Movement

- Intelligent AI

- Ball Movement

- Lives

- High Scores

- Hours of Play Time

Development Time: 1hr

Update:

Development Time: 2.5hrs

> Added Enemy Controller

> Added UI

> Added Mac Download

> Added More Features

Update 2:

Development Time: 3hrs
